New Records: Mitchell Marsh scored his maiden ODI World Cup century.
Marsh and Warner registered Australia's highest first-wicket partnership in ODI World Cups.
This is the first time that two Australian openers have scored centuries in ODI World Cups.
Key Match Events: Mitchell Marsh scored 121 runs off 108 balls, hitting 10 boundaries and nine maximums.
David Warner and Mitchell Marsh put up a record opening stand of 259 runs.
Shaheen Shah Afridi broke the partnership in the 34th over.
